name: Curious George in Outer Space
overview: Curious George™ in Outer Space brings to life George and his adventures for children to enjoy. The program combines an endearing story of George's mishaps on a strange planet with the practice of basic comparison concepts. Children become involved in the interactive story about George and his space friends. The interactive story, "Curious George in Outer Space' begins with George visiting a space museum with the man in the yellow hat. Before long, George's curiosity leads him aboard one of the spaceships that soon blasts off. He lands on a planet inhabited by friendly space creatures of various sizes. As the interactive story continues, the children help George return home while practicing com parison concepts.
